H3.text: which government had more power under the articles of confederation. states

A4.text: Each state retains its sovereignty, freedom, and independence, and every power, jurisdiction, and right, which is not by this Confederation expressly delegated.

A5.text: the central government's power was kept quite limited. The Confederation Congress could make decisions but lacked enforcement powers.
